0.0.1.name: wordpress/tourily
0.0.1.description:
Tourily plugin creates custom property listings and real estate virtual tours. This plugin works with a free Tourily.com account in order to provide you with search engine optimized virtual tours on tour own website.

Features in V1.0:

  • Search engine optimized virtual tours.
  • Property listing detail page.
  • Widgets to display listings in widget ready areas.
  • Shortcodes to embed property listings within pages or posts.

To use this plugin you need an active username and password at Tourily.com.
